description: Least positive multiple of n written in base 8 using only 0 and 1.
links: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: f:= proc(n) local R, S, m, p, Snew, s;   R[1]:= 1; R[0]:= 0; S:= {0,1};   for m from 1 do      p:= 8^m mod n;      Snew:= map(s -> s + p mod n, S);      if member(0,Snew) then return R[-p mod n]+10^m fi;      for s in Snew minus S do R[s] := R[s - p mod n] + 10^m od;      S:= S union Snew;    odend proc:0,1, seq(f(n), n=2..100); # _Robert Israel_, Dec 30 2014
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: added a(0) and corrected a(11), a(22), a(25) by _Chai Wah Wu_, Dec 30 2014
